Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: You can find our roadmap at the begining of this thread as well as in the Whitepaper (p. 13 in pdf). About partners - we will announce all important partnerships once the partners allow us to communicate it publicly. About strategy - it is a quite complicated topic and I am not sure if I even have enough info about it, but in general: our platform is open source and is focusing on ERP, CRM, and SCM systems in general - not just for some exact industry. All this ensures that everybody - small/big, developers/businesses, producers/sellers etc. can use our platform. The most important for us at this stage is to cooperate with our partners on the first implementation of blockchain into their businesses through SophiaTX, so they can lead by the example.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: I am a bit confused by your questions, so let's try to clear it up a bit. First of all... let's open our WHITEPAPER  Now - page 40 (pdf): you can see that 30 % of all tokens ever generated (150 000 000) will be generated during the TGE. Another 30 % will be mineable. You can find more about mining - or miners on page 33 (pdf). There won't be more than 500 000 000 tokens - it is a limit. Mining will be possible only for 25 years. After that, miners will be rewarded through fees.  I hope I answered (at least majority of) your questions. If there is still something left, please don't hesitate to ask again but first go through those pages so we can make sure we have the same basic info. Thank you.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: SophiaTX can help more with the quality than a price. Fighting counterfeit products, making sure all the conditions during transportation and storage of drugs are met and in the case, there is something wrong, it can speed up a process of tracing and recalls. All this can directly help save lives and protect the health of people but it can indirectly help with the price reduction through saving money. But the price of drugs is determined by many factors and the biggest one is the price of research. So even though there is some space for lowering the price it is quite limited.  You can find more about Pharma use case in our Whitepaper on page 19 in the pfd.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: We have some important announcements for you!  1. To prevent any further misunderstanding: Core sector communique is a medium writing about our partnership with KITA logistics. We do not have a partnership with Core sector communique.  2. If you don't have time to go through all the posts here and want to make sure you will see all our important announcements immediately - subscribe to our Telegram CHANNEL  3. Maybe we missed your question here or we just weren't able to find out answer fast enough - you can always ask any question on our Telegram GROUP where you can also find our CEO Jaroslav Kacina. And even though he is a busy man, he sometimes finds the time to answer people's questions (you can still tag him and wait if you want an answer directly from him).

Author: Rigorous
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Some medicines are incredibly expensive. That is because R&D and trials require massive investments. Of course the investors want to recoup their investments, but a large amount of medicines fail for various reasons. Therefore the price includes the costs to develop both the failed and successful products. Especially when the number of patients is very small and the disease is hard to treat, medicine prices can be in the range of $100,000 a year per patient.  How can SophiaTx help to lower the price of medicines?

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: SophiaTX Brings Blockchain to Pharma with Verifiable Track & Trace Model; Intended partnership announced today with KITA Logistics: https://bitcoingarden.org/sophiatx-brings-blockchain-pharma-verifiable-track-intended-partnership-announced-today-kita-logistics/  SophiaTX, the first open-source platform to integrate blockchain with SAP and other Enterprise systems, has announced its intention to facilitate a holistic ‘track and trace’ solution for the transportation of products and medicines in the pharmaceutical industry. Each of the current top twenty prescription drugs (amounting to 10% of the global market in 2016) is produced by a company using SAP software products within their sourcing, manufacturing, or supply chain processes.  A joint Letter of Intent (LOI) announced today by SophiaTX and Equidato Technologies CEO Jaroslav Kacina and the General Manager of Riyadh-based KITA Logistics, Nabil Awan, confirms an intended partnership between the two businesses on the design and development of a blockchain solution for pharmaceutical logistics and transport...

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: There are more differences to Leonardo. First of all - SAP is maybe the most widespread enterprise software but it is definitely not the only one. We are currently focusing mostly on SAP but SophiaTX will also be a platform for Oracle, Salesforce, Microsoft Dynamics, and many more. Secondly - we are focusing on businesses of all sizes - not just big one but also not just on smaller one. We are also not focusing only on one industry. We want to create a holistic collaboration across industries and value chains.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: It is a very big company so it definitely has resources to monitor the market and there was also an article on SAP Africa website so we are sure they know about us. But we haven't spoken to them officially about anything. We do not compete with them directly since as we mentioned in our Whitepaper: "The SAP company has introduced a very compelling offering under its SAP Leonardo innovation effort. SAP’s blockchain approach of BaaS20 (Blockchain-as-a-Service) is suitable for large and midsize organizations seeking a rather private and consortium-based setup. Having said that, opening it to wider public participants may prove to be challenging and less trusted by typical blockchain advocates. In our view BaaS is coming short of being truly inclusive of all participants across value chains, does not provide sufficient transparency, and has a tendency to be relatively more expensive."

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: SophiaTX is a project based on the same proprietary technology as DECENT. SophiaTX was created by DECENT and Venaco Group together, through the formation of the joint venture Equidato Technologies. DECENT has developed its own proprietary blockchain called DCore. DCore's fundamental componenets can be customized and combined to build blockchain solutions and applications for businesses. Which means, that DECENT brings the technology, and Venaco Group the experience in enterprise applications for business. SophiaTX offers business specific features and its own token, the SPHTX. It is neither a competitor not a formal part of DECENT, but rather a partner to allow the technologies to be adopted by businesses of all sizes and for a broader range of applications.

We are interested in more serious investors, who are interested in our project because they see the value it brings and not just a bounty hunters, who want to get super rich fast not even knowing what is SAP and what we are doing.

Author: sltshp
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: I didn't ask any question, but there was someone else asking and he was simply told to look for it in the whitepaper.  To quote the exact question asked: " so what kind of data will be stored in cloud ? can you elaborate on the data types?" , "Give me a SAP Transaction or program where in ERP can be expected to make a Blockchain CALL" , also there were some SAP specific questions with attached photos, asking if plug-in functions could work.  Definitely not in the whitepaper.  I don't know why all of a sudden this thread has a ton of people jumping to their defense all repeating the same thing "oh maybe its the same question that got asked before". As an investor you should always be skeptical and analyzing a company thoroughly. If something looks like a red flag, you have to keep probing until u get a satisfactory response.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: You would find the answer in our Whitepaper but since it is quite at the end you have probably didn't get there yet . I will just copy it here for you as well as for others who might have the same question:  Ethereum  Despite the fact this is one of the most dominant platforms currently in use for ICO/TGE and many other uses, we have concluded that using Ethereum for integration with business applications has its limitations. It is possible to use Ethereum for some selective business contracts and transactions, however, providing a holistic high-performance blockchain, in our view, would not be attainable, partly due to the use of Proof-of-Work (PoW). Also, it is required that a business suitable blockchain must have a certain level of privacy and encryption currently not used by Ethereum.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: "In September, SophiaTX announced the first open-source platform to primarily integrate blockchain technology with SAP software, used by 87 percent of global businesses and 98 percent of the top 100 most-valued brands." Read the article by Nasdaq, an American stock exchange and the second-largest exchange in the world.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: SophiaTX is a public blockchain platform with a focus on use by businesses of all sizes, i.e. from large global enterprises to small local businesses and eventually to end consumers. It allows for businesses to join and participate across the entire value chain, enabling SophiaTX the best possible drive for global adoption. This choice, over the alternative of a private blockchain, supports the goal of creating a truly holistic collaboration.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: It is simple. We want to motivate people to invest in the earlier rounds. There has to be some kind of mechanism to reward early investors since most of the people are aversive to a risk and therefore are waiting until they see that the TGE will be successful. If everybody (or just most of the investors) would wait until the last round to see if it will be successful it could fail even though there actually were enough people and enough money for the TGE to be successful.  So if they want to be sure and are willing to pay more for being sure, they can wait until the last round. But if they really believe in the success of our project they are willing to take a little bit of risk to be first to invest and they will trade this risk for more tokens.  (I personally think that only crazy people would take a risk for no reason. Or maybe someone who really likes to feel uncertain. But the rest of us is taking the risk every day because we think it will pay off).

Author: kraterion
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Yes but unlike PoS, with DPoS you don't have to let your wallet opened 24/7. Your total coins are your voting power, you vote a delegate (a delegate is a node of the network), if he has enough votes to enter the forging pool (ARK for example has 51 forging delegates), he start to generate coins for his work of securing the network. A delegate can decide a % of generated coins to share (example 90%) and he shares those with his voting wallets. More coins you have -> higher is your voting power -> active delegate send more coins to you

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Hello. SophiaTX is definitely not a scam. We listed here the reasons why SophiaTX is a good project: We already have a working prototype! You can read about it on our blog here. There will be another blog that will describe the Proof of Concept in a bit more detail. We have the first class experts on our team. You can always see members of our team as well as our advisors on our website, where you can also find links to their LinkedIn profiles. We have high potential use cases which you can find in our Whitepaper, as well as real customers in the pipeline, some of which we will announce before the start of the TGE (probably next week)! Here is also some media coverage from thrustworty media that we've got: FORBES, iTreasurer, BlockTribune, Global Association of Risk Professionals - GARP, even the SAP.

Author: SophiaTX

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: I found this definition on this page: "The main difference between altcoins and tokens is in their structure; altcoins are separate currencies with their own separate blockchain while tokens operate on top of a blockchain that facilitates the creation of decentralized applications." Coins are a more universal "coinage" - you can pay with them for a variety of things. Tokens on the other side are used for "one" purpose - in our case for our platform.  Yes, you will have to have our wallet to buy our tokens.

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: SophiaTX Unveils Proof of Concept Business transactions over blockchain; Fast, Secure, System to System automation: https://bitcoingarden.org/sophiatx-unveils-proof-concept-business-transactions-blockchain-fast-secure-system-system-automation/  The SophiaTX team has delivered and unveiled a working Proof of Concept that demonstrates how companies can exchange information between their enterprise systems, such as SAP, using SophiaTX blockchain. As per SAP company, its software touches 74% of the world’s transaction revenue and is used by 87% of Fortune 2000 companies.  The proof of concept shows the capability of sending a variety of documents and in the demonstration they showcase a customer invoice automatic transfer between SAP systems. The customer invoice was created directly in one SAP system and then automatically transferred via SophaTX testnet to another company using another SAP system. A detailed description of this example, as well as others, can be found in the project’s whitepaper...

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Hi, our Token generation event is scheduled for December 5th and will last 10 days.  If you are interested in our project you can find some important information here: We already have a working prototype! You can read about it on our blog here. There will be another blog within the 24 hours that will describe the Proof of Concept in a bit more detail. We have the first class experts on our team. You can always see members of our team as well as our advisors on our website, where you can also find links to their LinkedIn profiles. We have high potential use cases which you can find in our Whitepaper, as well as real customers in the pipeline, some of which we will announce before the start of the TGE (probably next week)! Here is also some media coverage from thrustworty media that we've got: FORBES, iTreasurer, BlockTribune, Global Association of Risk Professionals - GARP, even the SAP.

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Blockchain for Business SophiaTX Reveals New Details of Platform; Confirms Date for Token Generation Event: https://bitcoingarden.org/blockchain-business-sophiatx-reveals-new-details-platform-confirms-date-token-generation-event/  SophiaTX, the first open-source platform to integrate blockchain with SAP and other ERP, CRM and SCM systems, has confirmed that it’s Token Generation Event (TGE) will begin on December 5th 2017.  The company has also unveiled a working Proof of Concept and recently published a white paper revealing significant new details on its functionality and potential for businesses of all sizes.  Details in the white paper reveal the limitations of current blockchain, including Ethereum, Hyperledger, and SAP’s own Blockchain-as-a-service (Baas). These systems do not provide sufficient privacy, speed or features which would allow mainstream adoption by businesses...

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Bitcoin Garden: DECENT Unleashed the Unchained Conference in Hong Kong https://bitcoingarden.org/decent-unleashed-unchained-conference-hong-kong/  Blockchain technology platform DECENT was pleased to present the Unchained Conference. More than 100 elite blockchain experts from around the world gathered in Hong Kong to discuss and explore this cutting-edge technology.  The conference was uniquely purposed to help guests connect with blockchain industry leaders and innovative cryptopreneurs. Tech disruptors, payment processor experts, investors and other thought leaders were all in attendance –  and with just 120 exclusive seats, the event was an intimate opportunity to connect without all the noise of a traditional conference.  [...]  Jaroslav Kacina, Founder and CEO of SophiaTX led a presentation on “Breakthrough Innovation with Blockchain” where he went into detail about bridging the gap between blockchain technology and business models, a topic he is particularly specialized in coming from a background of more than 22 years experience delivering technology transformation services for businesses around the world...

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: SophiaTX is not a hard fork in this sense you are referring to. Hard forks share a common history, while SophiaTX will use the DECENT technology to launch an entirely new blockchain (from block 1) with their own token. SpohiaTX is not a competitor, rather a partner. Venaco Group Brings the business side and DECENT the technological expertise. They created SophiaTX together through their JV - Eqiuadato Technologies. While this may not have a direct impact on DCT, it shows very strongly that the technology is ready for adoption.

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Bitcoin Garden: SophiaTX – The Blockchain Platform to Redefine Business Models: https://bitcoingarden.org/sophiatx-blockchain-platform-redefine-business-models/  SophiaTX is a new innovative project led by Equidato Technologies AG, to launch an open source platform aimed at connecting the world of enterprise applications and blockchain. The SophiaTX platform, suitable for businesses of all sizes, will allow a global community of SAP experts, consultants and developers to deliver blockchain capabilities to enterprises across all industries.  The adoption is supported by a marketplace which includes APIs and common building blocks, specifically developed for widely-used ERP and CRM systems and other business applications which will allow for inter-connectivity with their respective APIs all supported by the blockchain network.  Whilst the traditional approach focuses on protecting the company’s internal IT environment, this new approach is driven by fast-paced technological advancements and competitive forces which take it beyond a business’ traditional walls. The potential uses and related benefits of connecting business applications with blockchain are numerous and are in fact likely to grow exponentially once more and more company processes are explored...

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Bitcoin Garden: Introducing SPHTX Token – The Fuel of SophiaTX: https://bitcoingarden.org/introducing-sphtx-token-fuel-sophiatx/  SophiaTX is a Blockchain Platform and Marketplace that integrates business applications and solutions into a collaborative environment. This is a scalable and flexible solution, serving as the foundation for new applications with specialized processes and modules for companies where peer to peer architecture and decentralization is desired and beneficial.  The platform is fueled by SPHTX (SophiaTX token) which is used to cover mining and transaction fees, allow access and subscription to the development platform and marketplace, buy and sell assets or micro-assets & services, and allow for in-app purchases. A SophiaTX marketplace will be created, designed for trading applications and assets, know how, process maps and blueprints, integration, and professional consulting services to enable accelerated adoption and use...

Author: S3cco
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: SophiaTX – Bridging SAP and Blockchain Communities: https://bitcoingarden.org/sophiatx-bridging-sap-blockchain-communities/  SophiaTX is the first platform to focus on integrating blockchain with SAP and other major ERP, CRM, and SCM systems to expand the possibilities of enterprise applications with the trust and security that comes with blockchain technology. The project was born from the idea of creating a link between two ecosystems – the traditional enterprise application software that is largely represented by SAP and the emerging ecosystem of Blockchain.  The platform can be thought of as three components. It consists of a blockchain built on DECENT’s proprietary blockchain technology, (specifically developed and enabled to power a B2B transaction engine); a development platform with integration APIs to SAP and other enterprise applications; and a marketplace. The platform is fueled by SPHTX token which is used to cover mining and transaction fees, allow access and subscription to the development platform and marketplace, buy and sell assets or micro-assets & services, and allow for in-app purchases...

Author: domdomdec
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: I'm doing some research on the company as we have no information apart from a few recent articles.  Has anyone found any information on Venaco?  Can't see any real projects Besides marketing affirmations and articles, I can't find any relevant informations about the company.  " WORLDWIDE EXPERIENCE BEST IN CLASS EXPERIENCE IN SAP TRANSFORMATION INITIATIVES ACROSS INDUSTRIES: Switzerland, France, Germany, UK, US, Canada, Poland, Slovakia, China, UAE, Singapore, Malaysia, Brazil... 40+ countries, all continents."  No projects or no clients names besides the big companies related to employees past experience according to linkedin  Apparently the group exist since at least 2010 from Roman Vendzur linkedin profile where I can see that it's his only listed working experience. The others joined only recently.  The company scpecialities according to their linkedin company page :SAP Implementation, SAP Project Recovery, CxO Advisory, Expert Network, Predictive Analytics, SAP Business One Cloud, Hosting Services, SAP S/4HANA Cloud, SAP BW/4HANA Cloud, Turnaround, Business Transformation, Blockchain for Enterprises, Innovation Lab, Stakeholder Management, and Value Capture & Business Realization  However team consist of 8 members amongst which 5 managing partners. 25 followers to date. I'm surprised to see so low numbers even for a recently established company (2010 according to Roman Vendur's experience).  I've checked one of their services you can find on their website -Octocloud who's company page was recently created and currently there are no employees endorsed to it and only 3 followers  Equidato linkedin page has only 5 followers and no activity, no employee.  Both, venaco and octocloud have only one activity on linkedin: they shared the forbes article 2 days ago.  I was expecting more concrete experiences after the forbes articles. Did I miss something?  I'm also surprised how they make strong affirmation such as in their post-  Topic Summary Posted on: Today at 02:47:07 PM Posted by: SophiaTX A new study proves that there is huge potential for uses and benefits of connecting blockchain and traditional enterprise solutions. This gives credit to the idea behind SophiaTX’s platform which will allow a global community of SAP experts, consultants and developers to deliver blockchain capabilities to enterprises across all industries. Read more about it on our blog!  It's a company fact sheet, I don't see any "proof" as cited. It does not seem to give any additional credit to the idea behind SophiaTX. Can someone clarifies this for me? Thanks for your help I'm a newbie trying to do some research before investing.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: Venaco Group is a newly established company in 2016 from veterans in the SAP industry (not to be confused with Venaco in SVK).  The team has years of experience and has worked for many large companies including Accenture, EY, Deloitte, HP, McKinsey and others (all verifiable). It is a lead by Ex-McKinsey SVP and focuses on specialty advisory and innovation in SAP transformation. We do not disclose the clients we work for because nature of our work is highly sensitive (critical situations, recovery and turnaround) - simply when things go wrong. We protect the confidentiality required in such situations - since it could send signal regarding publicly traded companies.  Feel free to reach out directly to company and CEO for explanations.  Also can provide references for serious enquirers.  We also plan to hold webinars with CEO and others, where all these questions can be asked.  Hope this helps

Author: Raxitto
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: AGEquidato Technologies, a joint venture between DECENT, the blockchain content distribution platform, and GroupVenaco, the independent and best-of-breed company in SAP and innovation, are today announcing the formation of SophiaTX: a platform and blockchain market for companies of all sizes. The enterprise makes it the first open source platform to fundamentally integrate blockchain technology with SAP, allowing both users and integrators to use blockchain. The SophiaTX platform can be thought of as three elements. It is made up of a blockchain based on DECENT's own blockchain technology, developed and enabled specifically to trigger a business-to-business transaction mechanism; a development platform with API integration to SAP and other enterprise applications; and a market for a global community of experts, consultants and developers to purchase and sell applications.

Author: SophiaTX
Title: [ANN] SophiaTX Announcement - The Blockchain for Business
Body: SophiaTX - The Blockchain for Business      FAQ | WEBSITE | TWITTER | REDDIT | FACEBOOK | LINKEDIN | TELEGRAM     DESCRIPTION  Designed as an evolutionary Blockchain Platform and Marketplace, SophiaTX integrates leading enterprise applications and solutions, covering major ERP, CRM, and SCM systems, into a collaborative environment across multiple industries. SophiaTX blockchain is tailored for extending traditional enterprise applications, and allows enhancing and reshaping current business models.  Watch SophiaTX Introductory Video  More details: SophiaTX Whitepaper     How Will Blockchain Impact Your Industry?  SophiaTX blockchain platform provides collaborative project environment connecting diverse technologies. It's estimated that 10% of the Global GDP will be enabled in blockchain technology by 2027.      Connect to Blockchain and  Reshape your Business Model                         Fit for Business  Leverage Smart Contracts Share Info Across Entire Value Chain Improve Collaboration Shorten Cycle Times Provide Micro-services Innovate and Disrupt Industry                       Flexible  Common Building Blocks Standardized APIs IOT Integration Smart Contracts at Transaction Level Processing Speed Exceeding 2000TPS System Agnostic                       Secure  Immutability Traceability Advanced Encryption & Anonymity Business Compliance Mining Suitable for Business Public / Private       What makes SophiaTX and blockchain technology the next frontier in advancing traditional business models?  For companies to benefit from blockchain they must understand what blockchain is, develop business use cases and ultimately redefine their business models. Blockchain will impact businesses in a similar fashion that dot com revolution did.    Benefits of Blockchain       Fewer Intermediaries  Blockchain is a true peer-to-peer network that will reduce reliance on several types of third-party intermediaries such as banks, lawyers, and brokers.      Faster Processes  Blockchain can speed up the process execution in multi-party scenarios and allow for faster transactions that aren’t limited by office hours.     Transparency  Information in blockchains is viewable by all participants and cannot be altered. This will reduce risk, fraud, and create trust.       Cost Reduction  Distributed ledgers will provide quick ROI by helping businesses create leaner, more efficient, and more profitable processes.       Security  The distributed and encrypted nature of blockchain means it will be difficult to hack. This shows promise for businesses and IoT security.      Automation  Blockchain is programmable – which will make it possible to automatically trigger actions, events, and payments once conditions are met.    Understand Blockchain and Its Potential in Business with SophiaTX Academy  Learn what blockchain can do for your business and explore real use-cases with our industry professionals. Find the right course for you here: https://academy.sophiatx.com/        SPHTX - SophiaTX Token    How to get SPHTX   SPHTX - Token Allocation  500 Million (500,000,000) SPHTX, of which:   35% Development, Operations, Marketing, Team  30% SPHTX TGE ($23,470,356.5 raised - CoinMarketcap rates, December 18, 2017)  30% Mining  5% Future SPHTX TGE      ROADMAP  The following roadmap illustrates the most important features and timeline for building a business suitable blockchain and respective application.  The roadmap outlines the high-level initiatives and provides an indicative timeframe for the delivery and readiness of the platform.  Roadmap for 2019 will be released soon     SophiaTX in the Press      Blockchain Platform SophiaTX Joins Hyperledger to Expand Blockchain into New Industries   => Read here     SophiaTX and BizCode announce their partnership to bring blockchain innovations to Poland  => Read here      SophiaTX and Ernst & Young are collaborating on blockchain automotive industry  => Read here     CEO of SophiaTX Takes the Business Blockchain Discussion to IT Executive Forums Organized by Evanta, a Gartner Company  => Read here     Swiss Venaco Group expands to Asia by partnering Cheng & Co   => Read here     SophiaTX named the Blockchain Company of the Year  => Read here     An Open Ledger: Six Ways Blockchain Will Change Supply Chains (by Jaroslav Kacina, CEO SophiaTX)  => Read here     Blockchain for Business SophiaTX Reveals New Details of Platform; Confirms Date for Token Generation Event  => Read here
